definitions.definition: The direction opposite to that of the earth's rotation , specifically 270°.
examples: We used to live in the west of the country.
Portugal lies to the west of Spain.

definitions.definition: The western region or area; the inhabitants thereof.
In a church: the direction of the gallery, opposite to the altar, and opposite to the direction faced by the priest when celebrating ad orientem .

main_definition: The direction opposite to that of the earth's rotation , specifically 270°.
secondary_definitions: The western region or area; the inhabitants thereof. [circa 1300]
( ecclesiastical ) In a church: the direction of the gallery, opposite to the altar, and opposite to the direction faced by the priest when celebrating ad orientem .
